text: uqthsRujyAM(3)nOthsRujyA(3)miti# mImA(gm)santE brahmavAqdinaq-stadvA#huruqth sRujya#mEqvEtya#-mAvAqsyA#yAM ca paurNamAqsyAM cOqth-sRujyaqmityA#hurEqtE hi yaqj~jaM ~Mvaha#taq itiq tE tvAva nOthsRujyEq ityA#huqryE a#vAntaqraM ~Myaqj~jaM BEqjAtEq itiq yA pra#thaqmA vya#ShTakAq tasyA#muqth-sRujyaqmityA#hurEqSha vai mAqsO vi#Saqra itiq nA&&*di#ShTaq - [  ] 19
